TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi beforefieldinit LinkLabel/LinkCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
type LinkLabel.LinkCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 表示 控件中的链接集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of links within a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类存储中显示的链接控件。The class stores the link displayed in the control. 集合中的每个项是的一个实例类，该类定义的链接的信息。Each item in the collection is an instance of the class, which defines the information of the link. 方法提供的功能将添加单个到集合。The method provides the ability to add a single to the collection. 若要删除的链接，可以使用任一方法或如果知道该链接位于集合内的方法。To remove links, you can use either the method or the method if you know where the link is located within the collection. 方法使您能够从而不是使用集合中移除所有链接方法一次都删除的单个链接。The method enables you to remove all links from the collection instead of using the method to remove a single link at a time. 用于添加和移除项，方法和属性除了还提供了方法来查找集合中的链接。In addition to methods and properties for adding and removing items, the also provides methods to find links within the collection. 方法使您能够确定是否是集合的成员。The method enables you to determine whether a is a member of the collection. 一旦您知道该链接位于集合内，就可以使用方法可确定该链接是否位于集合内。Once you know that the link is located within the collection, you can use the method to determine where the link is located within the collection.

span.span: The starting character within the text of the label where the link is created.

param.name: length
param.span: 链接文本中将包括的起始字符之后的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters after the starting character to include in the link text.

summary.span: 向集合添加链接。

span.span: Adds a link to the collection.

returns.span: 表示已创建并添加到集合中的链接的 。

span.span: A representing the link that was created and added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件可以显示在控件文本内的多个链接。A control can display multiple links within the text of the control. 方法使您能够将中的文本转换到可以由用户来执行任务类似于单击的链接控件控件。The method enables you to convert text within the control to a link that can be clicked on by the user to perform tasks similar to a control. 此方法将添加到创建的链接为。This method adds the link that is created to the for the . 例如，如果你想要设置单词"快速"中的标签文本，"The quick brown fox"，则调用与此方法`start`参数设置的值为四 （4) 和`length`参数五 （5)。For example, if you want to set the word "quick" in the label text, "The quick brown fox", you call this method with the `start` parameter set to the value of four (4), and the `length` parameter to five (5). "快速"然后将更改的链接和链接到该单词添加到集合。The word "quick" then changes to a link and the link is added to the collection. 如果你想要将信息相关联的链接，例如显示或要在用户单击该链接时打开的文件的 URL 与使用其他版本的方法。If you want to associate information with the link, such as the URL to display or a file to open when the user clicks on the link, use the other version of the method. > [!NOTE] > 两个链接不能共享相同的文本。Two links cannot share the same text. 如果您创建使用已由另一个链接的文本的链接，将引发异常。If you create a link that uses text that is already used by another link, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了如何设置属性使用枚举。The following example demonstrates setting the property using the enumeration. 它还演示如何设置， ，并属性和商品添加到。It also demonstrates setting the , , and properties and adding items to a . 若要运行此示例，请将其粘贴在空白的窗体并调用`InitializeLinkLabel`从窗体的构造函数或`Load`方法。To run this example, paste it in a blank form and call `InitializeLinkLabel` from the form's constructor or `Load` method. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CPP/form1.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.LinkLabelExample/VB/form1.vb#1)]

returns.span: 表示已创建并添加到集合中的链接的 。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件可以显示在控件文本内的多个链接。A control can display multiple links within the text of the control. 方法使您能够将中的文本转换到可以由用户来执行任务类似于单击的链接控件控件。The method enables you to convert text within the control to a link that can be clicked on by the user to perform tasks similar to a control. 此方法将添加到创建的链接为。This method adds the link that is created to the for the . 例如，如果你想要设置单词"快速"中的标签文本，"The quick brown fox"，则调用与此方法`start`参数设置的值为四 （4) 和`length`参数五 （5)。For example, if you want to set the word "quick" in the label text, "The quick brown fox", you call this method with the `start` parameter set to the value of four (4), and the `length` parameter to five (5). "快速"然后将更改的链接和链接到该单词添加到集合。The word "quick" then changes to a link and the link is added to the collection. 此版本的 Add 方法，可提供与通过链接相关联的其他信息`linkData`参数。This version of the Add method enables you to provide additional information that can be associated with the link through the `linkData` parameter. 例如，可以传递到`linkData`参数，其中包含要显示时单击该链接的 URL。For example, you can pass a to the `linkData` parameter that contains a URL to display when the link is clicked. 然后可以在你处理程序中使用此信息事件的控件在 Microsoft Internet Explorer 中显示的 URL。You can then use this information in your handler for the event of the control to display the URL in Microsoft Internet Explorer. > [!NOTE] > 两个链接不能共享相同的文本。Two links cannot share the same text. 如果您创建使用已由另一个链接的文本的链接，将引发异常。If you create a link that uses text that is already used by another link, an exception is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建显示一个链接，并单击控件的文本中定义的链接时，默认浏览器中显示 Microsoft 网站上的控件。The following code example creates a control that displays a link, and displays the Microsoft Web site in the default browser when the link defined in the control's text is clicked. 该示例定义的方法，初始化控制的方法，将处理并控件的事件。The example defines a method that initializes the control as well as a method that will handle the event of the control. 事件处理程序事件使用属性的类来确定默认浏览器中显示的 URL。The event handler of the event uses the property of the class to determine the URL to display in the default browser. 此示例要求它位于类。This example requires that it is located within a class. [!code-cpp[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/CPP/linklabelex.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/CS/linklabelex.cs#1)] [!code-vb[LinkLabel Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/LinkLabel Overview/VB/linklabelex.vb#1)]
